tool_description: Coordinates delivery appointments and schedules based on shipment status, recipient availability, and carrier capacity.

shipment_id.description: Unique shipment identifier to schedule delivery for

preferred_time_slots.description: Preferred delivery time windows in ISO format

error_messages: Shipment not ready: Shipment is not yet available for delivery scheduling. Check shipment status.
Invalid delivery address: The provided address cannot be validated or is incomplete.
Recipient contact invalid: Contact information format is incorrect or unreachable.
No available time slots: No delivery slots available for preferred times. Try alternative windows.
Address not serviceable: The delivery address is outside the carrier's service area.
usage: Provide shipment_id, recipient_contact, and delivery_address. Optionally specify preferred_time_slots, special_instructions, and signature requirements for customized scheduling.

driver_contact.description: Driver or delivery team contact information
